company.name: Asheville AI Solutions
company.description: Asheville AI Solutions is a locally based digital agency focused on providing high-performance AI-powered digital employees to small and medium-sized businesses. The company is veteran-owned and emphasizes integrity, honesty, and results.

services: Consulting on AI Adoption for Local Businesses

disclaimers.results: Asheville AI Solutions does not guarantee specific business outcomes.
disclaimers.api: OpenAI API usage may incur token costs as defined in your plan.
disclaimers.crm: Mari handles CRM automation directly — no junior agents will manage leads.
